This strike, authorized by Prime Minister Netanyahu, retaliates for recent Israeli troop injuries. Saad, a long-time Hamas operative, held significant roles, including heading operations and weapons manufacturing, and had survived previous assassination attempts.

description: A fatal stabbing in Rudrapur has ignited violent protests, leading to police lathicharge and arson at the roadways bus station. Two men are detained as Hindu organizations express outrage over the death of Tushar Sharma. Authorities are scanning CCTV footage to apprehend more suspects involved in the incident, which police state stems from a long-standing rivalry, not communal tensions.

title: 'Mere apology not enough’: BJP targets Mamata over chaos at Messi event in Kolkata; demands legal action
description: The BJP has strongly criticized West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee following chaos at Salt Lake Stadium during Lionel Messi's visit. Leaders accused the state government of gross mismanagement, demanding accountability and punishment for those responsible. The incident saw fans protesting, leading to vandalism and a police baton charge, with many ticket holders unable to see the football star.

title: Queer children face maximum discrimination, bullying at homes, schools: Survey
description: A recent survey of over 900 LGBTQ+ individuals by a Kolkata-based organisation, 'Bridge', which works for the rights of the community across Assam, Arunachal Pradesh, Manipur, Nagaland, Odisha, Jharkhand and West Bengal, reported that most bullying happens between the ages of 12 and 15 years

title: HECI Bill likely to be introduced next week, standalone teacher training institutes may gain accreditation
description: The HECI Bill 2025, now renamed Viksit Bharat Shiksha Adhikshan (VBSA) Bill, is set to be introduced in Parliament next week. The legislation will create a single regulator for higher education, replacing UGC, AICTE, and NCTE. Standalone teacher training institutes, previously outside accreditation frameworks, will now be evaluated under uniform standards. Aligned with NEP 2020, the bill aims to streamline regulation, accreditation, and learning outcomes across universities and colleges, providing consistency and a common benchmark.

description: The FBI released footage of a suspect in the Brown University shooting that killed two and injured nine. The individual, seen in black, was walking past a traffic light, though their face was not visible. Investigators are still determining how the shooter gained access to the classroom where the incident began.

Vigilance has since been increased.

The party claims to have collected over five crore signatures nationwide, criticizing the Election Commission's neutrality and demanding electoral reforms.

AI vs coders: Ex-Google CEO warns; ‘This could be the end for coders like me’
description: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt expressed astonishment at AI's rapid progress, particularly its ability to autonomously generate code, admitting his own potential obsolescence. He highlighted AI's significant impact on automating business operations like billing and accounting, predicting artificial general intelligence within three to five years. Schmidt cautioned about the need for human oversight to preserve agency and freedom.

While Hussain strongly supports Shivakumar for the post, Shivakumar himself urged people not to take the MLA's remarks seriously, stating legal action might be necessary.

title: GRAP-IV in Delhi: Schools shift to hybrid mode; all you need to know
description: Delhi schools hybrid classes 2025: Delhi schools have shifted to hybrid classes for students in Classes 1–9 and 11 as air pollution in the city worsens under GRAP-IV. The Directorate of Education instructed all government, government-aided, unaided private schools, and NDMC, MCD, and Delhi Cantonment Board schools to implement online and in-person learning wherever feasible. Stage IV restrictions include 50% staff work-from-home for offices, bans on BS-III petrol and BS-IV diesel vehicles, and limits on construction and non-essential trucks.

description: Delhi-NCR choked under severe toxic smog, with air quality hitting 491, the worst this year. Authorities invoked Stage IV GRAP, banning construction and restricting diesel trucks. Schools and offices adopted hybrid models. Experts cite emissions and weather for the crisis, urging emission cuts. Residents advised to stay indoors.

The American woman collapsed mid-air with symptoms of a seizure. Dr. Nimbalkar provided immediate medical aid, reviving her. When the passenger collapsed again, a priority landing was arranged in Delhi, ensuring her evacuation to a hospital.

title: Mumbai tops road traffic CO2 emissions/km; Delhi & Bengaluru among nation’s top 3 — key findings
description: Mumbai leads Indian cities in road traffic CO₂ emissions per km due to high vehicle density. A new study reveals major metros like Delhi and Bengaluru also show significant NOx and CO pollution. The research, part of the CHETNA project, mapped emissions across 15 cities at a 500-meter resolution.

description: USCIS has tightened photo rules for immigration documents, now requiring photos no older than three years to combat identity theft. Previously, older photos were allowed, even during the pandemic. This change, impacting most immigration requests except those needing new biometrics, aims to improve applicant verification and screening.

description: Dwyane Wade, reflecting on LeBron James' 23rd NBA season, expresses admiration and a fan's perspective on an impending era's end.  He acknowledges James' elite performance, even as fans call for retirement, and cherishes their shared championship history. Wade also humorously recalls the 'Big Three' introduction, highlighting the immense pressure and difficulty of winning.

title: David and Victoria Beckham net worth 2025: Football, fashion, business
description: Power couple David and Victoria Beckham boast a combined net worth of $900 million in 2025. David's fortune stems from his legendary football career and lucrative endorsements, while Victoria built hers through successful fashion and beauty empires.  Together, they manage valuable brands, support their family, and remain influential figures in global sports and fashion.

title: Climate migration begins: Tuvaluans relocate to Australia; special visas take effect
description: Australia has welcomed the first climate migrants from Tuvalu, a Pacific nation facing inundation due to rising sea levels. A groundbreaking bilateral treaty allows Tuvaluans to live, study, and work in Australia, receiving immediate access to essential services. This initiative offers a dignified pathway as the island nation grapples with existential threats from climate change.

title: Triple H and Stephanie McMahon’s combined 2025 net worth and career highlights
description: Triple H and Stephanie McMahon's combined net worth is estimated at $500 million in 2025, reflecting their significant contributions to WWE's corporate and creative success. Their leadership in talent development, branding, and strategic expansion has built a strong financial foundation and continues to shape WWE's future identity and growth under TKO.

title: AI browser battle: Google unveils Disco; Highlights gaps in OpenAI’s Atlas
description: Google unveils Disco, an experimental browser that transforms browsing activity into custom web applications using its Gemini 3 AI. This  approach, powered by GenTabs, directly challenges AI browsers like OpenAI's Atlas by building apps rather than just adding chatbots.  Disco aims to redefine browser functionality with AI at its core, offering a glimpse into the future of web navigation.
